main event: On January 9, 1950, an unidentified aerial object was observed in Los Alamos, New Mexico, reported by civilian witnesses.
interesting points: The object was described as incandescent green with a left trail that vanished in 2 seconds., The sighting lasted for about 2 seconds., Multiple eyewitnesses were scientists working at Los Alamos., The object was observed by Mr. Sidney Cracraft and corroborated by others., The investigation concluded the observation was a meteor.
